ë‹˜ë“¤ì•„ ë°ë°”ë°ì¢€ í•´ì£¼ì…ˆ ë§¤ì¹­ì´ ì•ˆì¡í˜€ ã…ˆã…‚ ë¶€íƒë“œë¦¼
Fk u this shit that we did the pretty good job so far.
My biggest advice for new people trying to play this game, is to watch some streams on Twitch to get a better understanding while you play.

This is a great concept, it is still early and the concept begs to be "fleshed out" more. There is SO much that can be done with it..

It's fun as it stands, like the original Left 4 Dead, it's about player vs player interaction and the excitement comes from dealing with another intelligence as your opponent/enemy, not so much from game AI or cut scenes.

Dead Before Daylight creates tension very well and makes for an exciting, stressful and fun experience.. but again, there is SO much that can be done with this game, using what's here as the foundation the options are almost limitless. The objectives could be changed to other things like repairing a vehicle, freeing other "victims", making a call to 911 and surviving until help arrives... and the list goes on..

My score : 7/10

This game is good, real good. If you can get past the toxicity of some of the player base its super enjoyable.

To sum this game up, its a game of tag, except with knives, and claws, and anything very lethal.

If you are looking for a game with a super salty player base, and you enjoy tag, this is for you.
This is a fantastic horror game, on both ends of the trials. Keep up the great work, devs!

Do you like teamwork? Do you enjoy jump-scares? Do you want a great ranking system? Last, but not least- do you enjoy wasting time with friends? If you said yes to any of these questions, get this game. I wish I would have bought it sooner.
Fun game, but i wished they added more free content instead of focusing on DLC's

Jogo muito bom de jogar com amigos, diversÃ£o garantida.
Como qualquer outro jogo se vc jogar sozinho tem chances de pegar players tÃ³xicos que nÃ£o irÃ£o te ajudar e jogarÃ£o sozinho o game todo, mas nÃ£o sÃ£o todas partidas, te garanto.

Ã‰ um jogo que pra mim me faz querer jogar cada vez mais para ficar melhor, conseguir loopar o killer por mais tempo, nÃ£o ser pego, fazer os objetivos da melhor forma.

O que me faz gostar do game tb Ã© que se vc joga de sobrevivente vc ta sempre tenso, tendo que se esconder ou correr, os killers tem mÃºsicas prÃ³prias que deixam o jogo mais imersivo ainda, te deixando com medo, nervoso, propenso a errar.

Jogar de killer tambÃ©m Ã© muito massa pois cada um tem uma mecÃ¢nica prÃ³pria, po tem algo mais foda que colocar pessoas em ganchos e vÃª-las gritar de dor??

Recomendo a todos que querem um jogo coop para jogar.

Pontos negativos: o jogo sofre com alguns bugs ainda, mas que parece que estÃ£o melhorando, nÃ£o parece ter muito investimento como: otimizaÃ§Ã£o, skins e criatividade na criaÃ§Ã£o dos personagens e perks.
Se vc vem de um jogo ou jÃ¡ jogou um jogo que investem bastante, notarÃ¡ isso nitidamente.

Edit: venho dizer que dei uma parada, ta ficando massante jogar, desbalanceamento de sobrevivente, players tÃ³xicos.. enfim, nÃ£o tenho conseguido mais me divertir entÃ£o larguei um pouco de mÃ£o, quem sabe no futuro eu volte.
Fun game, lots of bullshit for both sides. But it is still fun :)

Good game. I mean probably the best in this type of games. It's still worse than in 2019 (In my opinion) but at least it's playable, good to chill with friends and soloQ (Everyone hates soloQ especially in this game but I really enjoy it ^-^) This is my third update for this so yeah... Sowwy :3
